divs: Sighting Detailsill state thast while coming home from las vegas a metalic disk lifted off a near by moutain and approached us came about half way from the mountain top and did a wing tip rool then went back from exactly where it had taken off from this lasted about 2 minutes total i had a witness my passenger po box 553 oceanside ca i have many other encouters
